posts.author: vaibhav gaikwad
posts.heading: Angular 12 Features
posts.section1: Angular v12 is now available · Moving Closer to Ivy Everywhere · Transitioning from Legacy i18n Message IDs · The Future of Protractor.
posts.section2:
Angular is a platform for building mobile and desktop web applications. Join the community of millions of developers who build compelling user interfaces.

Angular 12 has arrived with a pile of improvements to its performance, language service, compiler, form validation, and much more.
posts.section3: Angular v12 includes stylish improvements, nullish coalescing—allowing developers to write cleaner code in TypeScript and Angular templates
